mapper.insert: insert into TB_CRM_TASK (ID, OWNER_USER_ID, ABOUT_USERS, SUBJECT, DUE_DATE, STATUS, PRIORITY, CREATOR_USER_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, ISCLOSE, DELETE_STATUS, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME, DESCRIPTION ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ownerUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aboutUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isclose,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=CLOB} )
mapper.update: update TB_CRM_TASK set OWNER_USER_ID = #{ownerUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ABOUT_USERS = #{aboutUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUE_DATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_USER_ID = #{creatorUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISCLOSE = #{isclose,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_STATUS = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_USER_ID = #{deleteUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, OWNER_USER_ID, ABOUT_USERS, SUBJECT, DUE_DATE, STATUS, PRIORITY, CREATOR_USER_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, ISCLOSE, DELETE_STATUS, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME, DESCRIPTION from TB_CRM_TASK where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
